com.example.inversekinematics.activities - package com.example.inversekinematics.activities
Three main activities of the game - Menu, Game and GameOver pop-up

Game objects used all around the game
com.example.inversekinematics.engine - package com.example.inversekinematics.engine
Game engine that handles updating the game state, movement, collisions, time etc.

Enums used all around the game used to direct program flow
com.example.inversekinematics.views - package com.example.inversekinematics.views
Main View used for displaying the game state with every tick
